MASK UP OR PAY UP?

Starting today, TSA officials announced that those who refuse to wear a mask while traveling by plane, train or bus could face some pretty hefty fines...

$500-$1000 for first offenders
$1000-$3000 for the second offenders 

Details on @WBTV_News at 630a. https://t.co/CGFRYiKA7S
